Suspected Violation Location.answer: construction site near the intersection of Main Street and 5th Avenue

Violation Description.info: Include a detailed description of the violation. For example, gas drilling, drum dumping etc. If necessary, include specific directions.
Violation Description.answer: Excessive air pollution caused by improper disposal of hazardous waste materials at 123 Main Street, downtown area of our city. This has led to an increase in air pollution levels, posing a threat to the health and well-being of local residents and surrounding ecosystems. An investigation and necessary measures to address the environmental violation and ensure proper waste disposal practices are requested.

Reporter Contact Information.info: You are not required to provide your contact information but the EPA might want to reach out to you for additional information.
